-N1720 W08212 -N1830 W08244 -N1841 W08339

TOP FL500 MOV NE 05KT NC==

UMMV SIGMET 8 VALID 151900/152300 UMMS-
UMMV MINSK FIR EMBD TSGR OBS AT 1830Z E OF E026 TOP FL400 MOV NNW
20KMH NC==
